definition: to glue/to paste/to adhere/to stick to
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
to stick/to affix/to adhere/to paste (as in "copy and paste")/Taiwan pr. [nian2 tie1]/also written 黏貼|黏贴[nian2 tie1]
see 粘皮帶骨|粘皮带骨[nian2 pi2 dai4 gu3]
to cohere/to group together as a unit/to agglomerate
army worm (e.g. Mythimna separata or Leucania separata etc, major cereal pests)

sentences.english: It took him quite some time to pick off the burs that had stuck to his coat.
sentences.chinese: 花了好長時間他才把粘在衣服上的刺摘掉。

sentences.english: Miss Nien always has the best interests of her students at heart.
sentences.chinese: 粘老師總是處處爲她學生的利益爲着想。
血把她的頭髮粘在一起。

sentences.english: The result shows that zinc phosphate cement is the most retentive cement.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，磷酸鋅粘固劑所獲粘接力最大。

sentences.english: The moisture of the stones, and the viscous nature of the timber framework furnished but poor supports to which to cling, either for hand or foot.
sentences.chinese: 潮溼的石頭和粘滑的溝槽對手和腳都是不利的支撐點。

sentences.english: Apply solution to the tube and allow to become tacky .
sentences.chinese: 在內胎上塗抹膠水並讓它發粘。

sentences.english: Puma fur was found clinging to bushes.
sentences.chinese: 灌木叢中也發現了粘在上面的美洲獅毛。

sentences.english: Please stick the luggage tags onto each piece of luggage.
sentences.chinese: 請將行李牌粘在每件行李上。

sentences.english: She doesn't end the mask stuck to Comus' chair.
sentences.chinese: 她並未理會粘在科瑪斯座椅上的面具。

sentences.english: Glue these to magnets and put them on the fridge.
sentences.chinese: 把這些東西粘在磁鐵上面，並放到冰箱上面。

sentences.english: 'Cos I've got a lot of honey on my nice new nose.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我有很多蜂蜜，粘在我漂亮的小鼻頭。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To detect the therapeutic effect of Agkistrodon acutus enzyme on elderly with hyperviscosemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察蘄蛇酶注射液對老年高粘血癥的治療效果。

sentences.english: Greasing a cooking surface ensures that your food won't stick.
sentences.chinese: 一個烹飪表面潤滑保證你的食物不會粘。

sentences.english: When I got it out of the trash, it was covered in soggy, sticky garbage.
sentences.chinese: 等我把手機掏出來的時候，上面滿是溼溼粘粘的物體。

sentences.english: When I got it out of the trash, it was covered in soggy, sticky garbage.
sentences.chinese: 等我把手機掏出來的時候，上面滿是溼溼粘粘的物體。

sentences.english: Be careful not to damage the sheet so it can be re-attached later.
sentences.chinese: 要小心損壞防水膜，之後還要粘回去。

definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue
to adhere/to stick together/to bond/to agglutinate/adhesion/adhesive
to moisten/to be infected by/to receive benefit or advantage through a contact/to touch
